	format: 'table') ~> engagement
msxopportunity, engagement exists(OpportunityId == engagement@OriginatingOpportunity,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
msxopportunity, engagement exists(OpportunityId == RelatedOpportunity,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists2
Exists1, Exists2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
